thread.title: Inventor turns smartphone into medical device to reduce botched injections (Nottingham Trent University)

author: wn.com
title: Inventor turns smartphone into medical device to reduce botched injections (Nottingham Trent University)
text: ( Source : Nottingham Trent University ) Wednesday 14 October 2015 Inventor turns smartphone into medical device to reduce botched injections Failed injections could be reduced after researchers developed a way for smartphones to be used
